__e: There was just myself, a fellow named Fry and my friend...
Now, chuck Fry and, so help me when we get home, I'll give you a new 5 pound note.
My name's Fry, and I think you're a cutie, 'cause I like things that have only one thing instead of two things.
Fry, there's nothing to be jealous of.
Fry, you saved my ass out there.
Thanks, Fry, you're a good friend.
